### Info

ID: `join_uns_to_obs`  
Namespace: `metadata`

### Links
[Source](https://github.com/czbiohub/utilities/blob/main/module_openpipeline/src/metadata/join_uns_to_obs){.btn-action .btn-sm .btn-info .btn role="button"}

:::

Join a data frame in .uns containing metadata to the .obs of a mudata file.

## Example commands

You can run the pipeline using `nextflow run`.

### View help

You can use `--help` as a parameter to get an overview of the possible parameters.

```bash
nextflow run czbiohub/utilities \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -main-script target/nextflow/metadata/join_uns_to_obs/main.nf \
  --help
```

### Run command

<details>
<summary>Example of `params.yaml`</summary>
```yaml

```
</details>

```bash
nextflow run czbiohub/utilities \
  -r main_build -latest \
  -profile docker \
  -main-script target/nextflow/metadata/join_uns_to_obs/main.nf \
  -params-file params.yaml
```

:::{.callout-note}
Replace `-profile docker` with `-profile podman` or `-profile singularity` depending on the desired backend.
:::

## Argument group

### Arguments

|Name       |Description       |Attributes                                 |
|:----------|:-----------------|:------------------------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input h5mu file   |`file`, required, example: `"input.h5mu"`  |
|`--output` |Output h5mu file. |`file`, required, example: `"output.h5mu"` |
